programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The Doc and the Junkster get desperate on the final day in Austin; Moe and Mary bid on a locker full of pinatas; Jenny seeks furniture, but obtains a new set of wheels instead.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the World of Sonny Monday
programme.desc: The bidders make a return trip to the city of Waxahachie; Vic and his protege meet Jamie Benn of the Dallas Stars; Ricky and Bubba sail to Houston; Jenny is touched by something angelic.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Jenny uses her feminine wiles to get an edge up on her mostly male competitors; Ricky and Bubba set a record; Mary has second thoughts on a locker find that Moe feels is worthless.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders hunt for rare art and designer furniture in Tyler, Texas; Lesa throws a tantrum; Bubba suffers from claustrophobia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary uncover a rare piece of history during a stop in the city of Garland; Jenny becomes influenced by a popular book series; a buyer arrives loaded with cash.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba play up their country roots; Victor goes after a scooter potentially worth $3,000; a silver item takes storage gold.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers brawl in the city of Henderson; Vic and Sonny receive a shot in the arm; Jenny arrives on four wheels.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba face off against Kenny and other locals in the eastern Texas city of Tyler; Jenny uncovers a holy grail of the music world.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders look for deals in Mesquite, Texas; items procured include a refurbished pool table and vintage equestrian gear; Jenny suffers a head injury.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Huntington Beach, Calif.; Barry introduces kitsch king Charles Phoenix to the joys of an auction; Darrell loses his home-field advantage.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi hope for a different outcome when the bidders return to Montebello, Calif.; Dave uncovers marketing Americana; Darrell's find could be the biggest in the group's history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders travel to Oxnard, Calif.; Dave seeks gold, but finds bronze; Jarrod fights a cold; Darrell and Brandon have a disagreement.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers target Dave Hester on his home turf of Costa Mesa, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon go over the top; Jarrod and Brandi's discovery takes them where no bidder has gone before.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A locker in Whittier, Calif., features a high payoff; Dave eyes a unit with a stockpile of antiques; Barry's locker may contain old weapons.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers scour a hippie town for 1970s memorabilia; Barry uncovers a relic from his past; Darrell finds a medical device with profit potential.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Almost the Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A three-ring circus erupts when the buyers head to Irvine, Calif.; Darrell speculates that Dave has gone broke.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Gardena, Calif., the buyers gamble on a sportsman's locker and a load of construction equipment; Barry arrives with a secret weapon.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: For a Good Time Call... Ivy
programme.desc: Ivy pranks the competition; Rene and Casey space out; Jarrod and Brandi may have to close their Long Beach store if they can't score a major profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Hemet, Calif., Jarrod and Brandi locate a tattoo locker and Dave hopes for a big payday; Barry showers Dave with kindness.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In San Francisco, Barry finds an old pair of boxers and Darrell takes a big gamble; Jarrod and Brandi uncover a top-secret find.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave gets in touch with his lighter side as the buyers visit Fontana, Calif.; Mary tries to add a touch of Texas to the festivities; Jarrod and Brandi attempt to recover from a bad purchase.

programme.sub-title: The Big Boy vs. the Heavyweight
programme.desc: The bidders roll into La Habra, Calif.; Darrell squares off against a former professional fighter; Jarrod and Brandi meet a nerd; Barry relaxes with a famous golfing friend.
